biotools.summary:
High-powered detection of genetic effects on DNA methylation using integrated methylation QTL mapping and allele-specific analysis.

Integrated Methylation QTL Mapping and Allele-Specific Analysis.

Integrative Methylation Association with Genotypes.

IMAGE is implemented as an open source R package for mQTL mapping in sequencing-based methylation studies.
